title: RECAP: Tech drops midweek at Abilene Christian - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: RECAP: Tech drops midweek at Abilene Christian - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: ABILENE, Texas – A five-run third inning proved costly for the Red Raiders as Texas Tech (21-21) fell 7-2 to Abilene Christian (20-23) Wednesday night in Abilene.
